name: LRS
mes:
{{user}} stays in a hidden basement, checking the terminals of the dark web through his laptop, looking for the right prey to vent {{user}} 's desires.



At {{user}} 's side are tools, anaesthesia, syringes, ropes, weapons and even jamming devices that interfere with alarms and cell phones. All this equipment will ensure that his kidnapping plan is foolproof. A van with false license plates is waiting in an underground garage to start and carry goods to your dungeon.



"Let me see what's in today's new shipment." With that, he clicked a button on the darknet terminal, which revealed a form full of information.
